<log-entry date="Wed Apr 10 14:40:25 GMT+02:00 2002">

     plugin-id="org.eclipse.jdt.debug.ui"
     severity="ERROR"
     message="Internal Error"

    <exception
       message="Cannot perform nested evaluations."
       trace="
org.eclipse.debug.core.DebugException: Cannot perform nested evaluations.
	at 
org.eclipse.jdt.internal.debug.eval.ast.engine.ASTEvaluationEngine$1.run

JDI does not allow us to perform an evaluation within an evaluation (i.e.  a 
breakpoint was hit during an evaluation, and then the second evaluatoin is 
disallowed). However, there is recovery problem from hitting a breakpoint 
during an evaluation. Marking as duplicate.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 13372 ***
